jodd.db.debug

Class LoggablePreparedStatementFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.db.debug.BaseLoggableFactory<java.sql.PreparedStatement>
      • jodd.db.debug.LoggablePreparedStatementFactory

  • public class LoggablePreparedStatementFactory
extends BaseLoggableFactory<java.sql.PreparedStatement>
    Factory for loggable prepared statements - a PreparedStatement with added logging capability.

    In addition to the methods declared in PreparedStatement, LoggablePreparedStatement provides a method BaseLoggableFactory.getQueryString(T) that can be used to get the query string in a format suitable for logging.

    Should not be used in production!

    • Field Summary
